District 8

District 8
==========

Chris Canales
-------------

**Current Term:**
1st |
January 2027

Thank you for electing me as your City Representative for District 8. I look forward to working with my constituents to build a better future for our children, accomplish great things for our city, and ensure the needs of District 8 are met.

Share any questions or comments regarding District 8:

**City Representative Chris Canales**
City of El Paso
300 N. Campbell
El Paso, Texas 79901
[district8@elpasotexas.gov](mailto:district8@elpasotexas.gov)

View Campaign Finance Reports
See Districts Map
